metadata.Title: CVE-2016-2815 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
Multiple unspecified vulnerabilities in the browser engine in MozillaFirefox before 47.0 allow remote attackers to cause a denial of service(memory corruption and application crash) or possibly execute arbitrarycode via unknown vectors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-2815` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 47.0+build3-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
firefox-globalmenu - 47.0+build3-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
firefox-mozsymbols - 47.0+build3-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
firefox-testsuite - 47.0+build3-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '47.0+build3-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
